MESSAGE: All the other kits went exploring the camp, you should to!
She is the leader of this clan in fact!
Anyway tell your sister to come back in here for now!
You'll make a fine warrior one day!
You talked to Wolfkit you say?
Not even Icestar can do that!!
You sure are my wonderful kit...
Wait, you know Wolfkit IS one of our kits from the litter!
Go play with him after exploring!
Go to Icestar! Its your naming ceremony!
Now what should I call you...

QUESTION: What prefix did I say again?

MESSAGE: How do you know this if Adderpelt was watching and not you?
Why is she not kicked out if she did that?
You must be Silverlily's third kit!
I'm Adderpelt, don't worry I'm very safe!
You finally decided to come out!
So what did mommy name you??
Well I hope I get to play with you!
You tried to take one without eating it but Adderpelt stopped you
I don't wanna say this to be mean but...
Me and your mother well...hate each other...
She took Foxpelt from me when me and him were so close and I was expecting kits...
And she hates me because she disagree's I had him first
When I had all my kits....
I had no one to see the beautys and then one night...
My kits were missing and I saw Silverlily laughing in the distance with my kits fur stuck in her claws!
OH sorry if this is hurtful to you....
Forestclan patrols kept looking for my kits but no sign....
One day Adderpelt was hunting and heard mewing coming from Stormclan....
He peaked at their camp and saw my kits getting beat by their leader...
Then the medicine cat stopped him and went into the medicine den
A while after she came out with the recovered kits....
A queen came out to nurse my kits and...and... atleast my kits had a home now...
Well run along kit, I told you enough.
After all you ARE Silverlily's kit and I said some pretty bad stuff about her.
I've been asking myself that to, the truth is....
It still follows the warrior code...
She didn't KILL my kits, just take them....
And if I did ban here, you'd never be here..
Oh but for Starclan sake, PLEASE leave me alone now...

STRING2: I might be your mentor when your apprenticed!

MESSAGE: All cats old enough to catch their own prey gather at high rock for a clan meeting!!

STRING1: From this day forward until you receive your warrior name you will be now known as

MESSAGE: *Can't hear you cause of hearing defect*
Oh yeah I can't hear you, even if I tried....
I have to use tail language!
Up down is yes side to side is no!
*swings "Well, I think you know it well now! Your go have fun outside!!"*
*Can't hear you cause of hearing defect*
